name: Guns-Like
description:
Guns-Like is a Horde Roguelite Shooting game about recolecting red gems and killing Slimes, Cocodriles with human form, Gunslingers and Rabbits with paralysis!

This game was made in one week for the 7DRL 2020 game jam.

I hope you like it!

Controls:

Arrow KeysMoveX
JumpCShoot
